page.title: 05Buckden and the Media
page.content:
There are several{free newspapers delivered ,the Independent,Trader,Town Crier and St. Neots Weekly News. Many of the village's events are reported in these papers, but mostly in the Weekly News. The local paper is the Hunts Post which has a village news section and covers most events.
Buckden has its own magazine, {The {Buckden Roundabout}which advertises coming events and is published monthly.
As well as the national{television {and Radio}broadcasts Buckden recieves several local radio stations, BBC Radio Cambridgeshire and Bedfordshire as well as Chiltern Radio. The village is in the Anglia television area. Only major events warrant coverage.
